div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1122 Cepi (mod. Sennaia), Taman' Pen- insula, Krasnodar Territory, RSFSR, 1959 Burial: c. mid 2nd cent. B.C. Contents: 11 AE. In burial Panticapaeum: 7 AE (as BMC 44-46 [5]; Zograph, pl. 41, 12 [1]; pl. 42, 11 [1]) Phanagoria: 4 AE (as BMC 2-3) Disposition: Moscow Frolova-Shelov, NSf 1965, pp. 190-1, nos. 320-30
